info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 12 at 11:26PM MDT until June 13 at 12:15AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Hand County in central South Dakota... Buffalo County in central South Dakota... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1225 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Etbauer Hill, or 14 miles east of Fort Thompson, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Gann Valley around 1235 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this tornadic thunderstorm include Rosehill Dam. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW! This cluster of thunderstorms is capable of producing tornadoes and widespread significant wind damage. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
